channel.title: Tin on ossem: a creative space
channel.description: Recent content in Tin on ossem: a creative space

item.title: Pi
item.description: She has presences In the Electric view A blinding stew … of plight and magic … A diplomatic Coefficient Bristled into Her Majestic (and few) (This is my first digital drawing, done on Leonardo. The character is based on Loish’s Huntress, which is easily my favorite work of hers. I liked it so much that I felt the need to mimic it and finally give this whole digital art thing a try.

item.title: Rough
item.description: High on Human So very High on Human Yeah, I'm High on Human So many stories and victories The agony And yeah, the drama You know it feeds the Momma This Human High So high! Why fight it (Just live it) Death is withdrawal Birth the next hit No questions now This Human got me crazy lit! High! So high, man Oh, the Human High High on Human Set sails So fairy tale Don't dwell Ride the Human High & Its blazed-out swell Oh man High as a kite again Thank you, Human Where you been?

item.title: Heart
item.description: It seems so long ago Yet yesterday All the way from the dusk and dawn and dusk again The moon and alleyways Walking past That police car, and trying my best to look n o r m a l And then you entered As a Shamaness A fortuneteller And spoke to me In Truth and Majesty In plain words And riddles, too Yes, we spoke in two planes That night In the real and In the surreal (visceral) The problems in the village Were the problems in me .

item.title: Spike
item.description: Oh, the prowl The staking howl Sounds on the take A whisper make Where's your pride Lost one? Looking for a Troubled ton Searching for your size and lies Only to find Your Lion Eyes

item.title: Leaf
item.description:
Phenomena is mind control. In remembrance of July 3rd, 1971.
May you rest in the peace that you so rightfully deserve, good sir.

item.title: Wane
item.description: Ignited praises Holy mazes Starbound gazes Trinity phases Destiny graces Multifold faces Spun laces Tied cases Flickering spaces Spiritual aces Dancing stasis Married places Angelic traces Deserted sages World stages Folly ages Spellbound cages Mystic mages Digging wages Justice rages

item.title: Side
item.description: With the monitors flickering upon his nearby, dark environment, Ron then wondered further that if the very reality that he is currently experiencing now is indeed a simulation of some sort – with technology accelerating at a seemingly accelerating rate – would it eventually culminate in the ability to accurately reflect the reality that Ron was in now? The idea struck Ron. Is the reality that Ron finds himself in now a result of jumping into a technology or program that started in the same way as he is currently experiencing?

item.title: Grind
item.description: (Based on an actual event.) “DID ANYONE CALL 911?!” I screamed as I jumped out of my car. “YES,” a voice rang out plainly to me. I felt stupid for asking. It would end up being my only contribution towards the entire disaster. The man in his car behind me – Kenneth, I would like to say – had just gotten out of his own vehicle and ran resolutely to the aid of whoever was trapped in the flipped over cold, blue car.

item.title: Pair
item.description: To Apollo, the god of strength and truth, from whom I learned the power of taking quiet solitude and the well-rounded value of keeping a well-formed opinion to one’s self. From a great many precepts, you taught me how to find and discern the many sides of an issue, while reserving judgement for only when it is absolutely required. To you, I am indebted to learning patience and fortitude, to understanding the harmonious workings of nature and man, and to keeping such courtesies within the realm of my consciousness.

item.title: Notes
item.description: A little idea I had back in the day. Does the Earth speak to us in notes?
